dml.team5

Class Utility

  • java.lang.Object
    • dml.team5.Utility

  • public final class Utility
extends Object

    This helper class contains useful utility methods.

    Version:
    1.1
    Author:
    Matthew Boyette (N00868808@ospreys.unf.edu)

      • buildSchemaMap

        public static final void buildSchemaMap(Connection connection)
                                 throws SQLException

        Builds a mapping of the database's schema, matching column names to table names.

        Parameters:
        connection - the Connection to the database server.
        Throws:
        SQLException - if a database access error occurs.
        Since:
        1.1

      • createDocument

        public static final Document createDocument(CachedRowSet results)
                                     throws ParserConfigurationException,
                                            SQLException,
                                            SAXException,
                                            IOException

        Creates an XML Document using the DOM API from the resulting CachedRowSet of a SQL query.

        Parameters:
        results - the resulting CachedRowSet of a SQL query.
        Returns:
        the Document.
        Throws:
        ParserConfigurationException - if a DocumentBuilder cannot be created which satisfies the configuration requested.
        SQLException - if a database access error occurs.
        SAXException - if a parsing error occurs.
        IOException - if an input/output error occurs.
        Since:
        1.1

      • executeSQLStatement

        public static final CachedRowSet executeSQLStatement(Connection connection,
                                                     String inputString)
                                              throws SQLException

        Executes a SQL statement on the database server and returns the corresponding CachedRowSet.

        Parameters:
        connection - the Connection to the database server.
        inputString - the input String containing the SQL query.
        Returns:
        the corresponding CachedRowSet.
        Throws:
        SQLException - if a database access error occurs, or the given SQL statement produces anything other than a single CachedRowSet object.
        Since:
        1.0

      • executeSQLStatement

        public static final CachedRowSet executeSQLStatement(PreparedStatement pstatement)
                                              throws SQLException

        Executes a SQL statement on the database server and returns the corresponding CachedRowSet.

        Parameters:
        pstatement - the PreparedStatement to execute.
        Returns:
        the corresponding CachedRowSet.
        Throws:
        SQLException - if a database access error occurs, or the given SQL statement produces anything other than a single CachedRowSet object.
        Since:
        1.0

      • getConnection

        public static final Connection getConnection(boolean isOracle)
                                      throws SQLException

        Establishes a Connection to the database server.

        Parameters:
        isOracle - true to connect to an Oracle database, false to connect to a MySQL database.
        Returns:
        the Connection to the database server.
        Throws:
        SQLException - if a database access error occurs.
        Since:
        1.0

      • getParser

        public static final org.antlr.v4.runtime.Parser getParser(String inputString,
                                                          boolean isModified)

        Lexically analyzes the input String and returns the appropriate Parser.

        Parameters:
        inputString - the input String.
        isModified - true to use the ModifiedPLSQLParser, false to use the PLSQLParser.
        Returns:
        the Parser.
        Since:
        1.1

      • getParseTree

        public static final org.antlr.v4.runtime.tree.ParseTree getParseTree(org.antlr.v4.runtime.Parser parser,
                                                                     boolean isSilent)
                                                              throws org.antlr.v4.runtime.RecognitionException

        Takes a Parser and returns a ParseTree.

        Parameters:
        parser - the Parser.
        isSilent - true to receive no console output, false otherwise.
        Returns:
        the ParseTree.
        Throws:
        org.antlr.v4.runtime.RecognitionException - if a parsing error occurs.
        Since:
        1.1

      • getParseTree

        public static final org.antlr.v4.runtime.tree.ParseTree getParseTree(String inputString,
                                                                     boolean isModified,
                                                                     boolean isSilent)
                                                              throws org.antlr.v4.runtime.RecognitionException

        Takes an input String and returns a ParseTree.

        Parameters:
        inputString - the input String.
        isModified - true to use the ModifiedPLSQLParser, false to use the PLSQLParser.
        isSilent - true to receive no console output, false otherwise.
        Returns:
        the ParseTree.
        Throws:
        org.antlr.v4.runtime.RecognitionException - if a parsing error occurs.
        Since:
        1.1

      • getSelectedElement

        private static final SelectedElement getSelectedElement(CachedRowSet results,
                                                        int columnIndex)
                                                 throws SQLException

        Returns the SelectedElement for the given CachedRowSet and columnIndex.

        Parameters:
        results - the CachedRowSet resulting from executing a SQL query.
        columnIndex - the index of the column in the CachedRowSet.
        Returns:
        the SelectedElement for the given CachedRowSet and columnIndex.
        Throws:
        SQLException - if a database access error occurs.
        Since:
        1.1

        Parameters:

        n - the minimum string length.
        Returns:

      • writeSQLResults

        public static final String writeSQLResults(CachedRowSet results)
                                    throws SQLException

        Constructs a table String from the results of a SQL query in the form of a CachedRowSet object.

        Parameters:
        results - the CachedRowSet resulting from executing a SQL query.
        Returns:
        the table String.
        Throws:
        SQLException - if a database access error occurs.
        Since:
        1.1

      • writeSQLResults

        public static final String writeSQLResults(CachedRowSet results,
                                           int minimumFieldWidth)
                                    throws SQLException

        Constructs a table String from the results of a SQL query in the form of a CachedRowSet object.

        Parameters:
        results - the CachedRowSet resulting from executing a SQL query.
        minimumFieldWidth - the minimum width of a field in characters.
        Returns:
        the table String.
        Throws:
        SQLException - if a database access error occurs.
        Since:
        1.1

      • writeSQLResults

        public static final String writeSQLResults(CachedRowSet results,
                                           int minimumFieldWidth,
                                           char separatorCharacter)
                                    throws SQLException

        Constructs a table String from the results of a SQL query in the form of a CachedRowSet object.

        Parameters:
        results - the CachedRowSet resulting from executing a SQL query.
        minimumFieldWidth - the minimum width of a field in characters.
        separatorCharacter - the character used to construct the separator between the table header and the table body.
        Returns:
        the table String.
        Throws:
        SQLException - if a database access error occurs.
        Since:
        1.1

      • writeXMLResults

        public static final String writeXMLResults(CachedRowSet results)
                                    throws SQLException

        Constructs an XML String from the results of a SQL query in the form of a CachedRowSet object.

        Parameters:
        results - the CachedRowSet resulting from executing a SQL query.
        Returns:
        the XML String.
        Throws:
        SQLException - if a database access error occurs.
        Since:
        1.1
